text: Ty Law (b. 10 February 1974) is a retired American football player. He played as a safety in the NFL. Law was drafted by the New England Patriots in 1995. He also played for the New York Jets (2005, 2008), Kansas City Chiefs (2006-2007) and Denver Broncos (2009). He retired after the 2009 season. Law was born in Aliquippa, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:New England Patriots players Category:New York Jets players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:Denver Broncos players Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Living people Category:1974 births
title: Ty Law
